result.arabic_text: رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡحِسَابُ
result.translation: Mana yanje Rurema Allah! Ngumiriza akabanga, Umbabarire ibicumuro noba narakoze nka kiremwa-muntu, Wongere Ubabarire n’abavyeyi banje[11] hamwe n’abemeramana bose ku musi ibiremwa vyahagaritswe kugira biharurirwe, biheze bihemberwe ivyo vyakoze”.
result.footnotes: [11] Yasabiye umuvyeyi wiwe imbere yuko amenya ko yamaze kugarariza, akaba umwansi w’Imana Allah.
